_sText:
Scenario :
A terrorist organization has ben spotted in full shift in an old manor .
According to the informators it would act a rear base which would be
useful has to manufacture counterfeit bills in a secret room , moreover
of the hostages would be retained there .

Counter-terrorists : find the secret room or are factories
the counterfeit bills , rescue the hostages and control the members
of organization .

Terrorists : prevent counter-terrorists to find the factory of counterfeit
bills by kill them all .

According to certain rumours there would have been in the past
a horrible crime in this manor which would be haunts since... good luck :)

***********************************

Map features :

- Fully optimized with maximum fps everywhere
- Fully physics lights ands objects
- Prevent player camping and bugs map use
- Scripted sequences with ghosts and manor
- customs models and sounds
- realistic design with ambient lights
- high quality mapping and texturing
- easters-eggs
- strategic gameplay
- design for zombie mod support
- radar map include
- real time camera display

more infos in auto-install executable pack .

Have fun !
